name: dissemination
content:

Add to word list
the act of spreading news, information, ideas, etc. to a lot of people: the dissemination of information Anything that stands in the way of the dissemination of knowledge is a real problem. See

circulation
distribution
propagation (SPREADING) formal
More examplesFewer examplesConcerns about the dissemination of personal medical information are likely to diminish once research leads to treatments.All commenters who addressed the question opposed electronic dissemination as the sole means to share an offer.
